bestPractices.title: Use v-model for Reactive State
bestPractices.description: Bind checkbox selections to reactive data for automatic state management
bestPractices.code:
<script setup>
import { ref } from 'vue';

const selectedPreferences = ref([]);
const preferences = [
  { id: 'pref1', label: 'Email', value: 'email' },
  { id: 'pref2', label: 'SMS', value: 'sms' }
];
</script>

<template>
  <InCheckBoxV2 
    v-model="selectedPreferences" 
    :options="preferences"
  />
</template>

<script setup>

exampleEnrichments.title: Checkbox Group with Validation
exampleEnrichments.description: Form with required checkbox and validation
exampleEnrichments.code:
<script setup>
import { ref, computed } from 'vue';

const agreements = ref([]);
const options = [
  { id: 'terms', label: 'I agree to Terms of Service *', value: 'terms' },
  { id: 'privacy', label: 'I agree to Privacy Policy *', value: 'privacy' },
  { id: 'marketing', label: 'I want to receive marketing emails', value: 'marketing' }
];

const isValid = computed(() => 
  agreements.value.includes('terms') && 
  agreements.value.includes('privacy')
);

const handleSubmit = () => {
  if (!isValid.value) {
    alert('Please accept required agreements');
    return;
  }
  // Submit form
};
</script>

<template>
  <form @submit.prevent="handleSubmit">
    <InCheckBoxV2 
      v-model="agreements"
      :options="options"
    />
    <button :disabled="!isValid">Submit</button>
  </form>
</template>

exampleEnrichments.title: Conditional Disabled Options
exampleEnrichments.description: Dynamically disable options based on user tier
exampleEnrichments.code:
<script setup>
import { ref, computed } from 'vue';

const userTier = ref('free'); // 'free', 'pro', 'enterprise'
const selectedFeatures = ref([]);

const featureOptions = computed(() => [
  { 
    id: 'basic', 
    label: 'Basic Features', 
    value: 'basic',
    disabled: false 
  },
  { 
    id: 'advanced', 
    label: 'Advanced Analytics (Pro+)', 
    value: 'advanced',
    disabled: userTier.value === 'free'
  },
  { 
    id: 'enterprise', 
    label: 'Enterprise Support (Enterprise Only)', 
    value: 'enterprise',
    disabled: userTier.value !== 'enterprise'
  }
]);
</script>

<template>
  <InCheckBoxV2 
    v-model="selectedFeatures"
    :options="featureOptions"
  />
</template>

performanceNotes: Large checkbox groups (50+ options) may impact render performance - consider virtualization
Re-creating options array on every render causes unnecessary re-renders - use computed or ref
Checkbox group with many options should use key prop for efficient updates
accessibilityNotes: Each checkbox automatically gets proper ARIA attributes
Ensure labels are descriptive and clear for screen readers
Required checkboxes should be marked visually (e.g., with asterisk)
Group related checkboxes with fieldset and legend for better context
